in reality, it shouldn’t take that long."},{"lineNumber":249167,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんたってこれから毎日、","translatedEnglishLine":"Because from now on, every you...\""},{"lineNumber":249170,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔王になるのはてめぇじゃねぇ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You’re not the one who’ll become the Demon King!"},{"lineNumber":249171,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この俺様だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s me!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これで魔王に覚醒されちゃあ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If the Demon King awakens like this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様の計画は全てパーだぜ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: my entire plan will be ruined, you know!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、大丈夫ですにゃん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, it's alright, nyan."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「床にぎっちり敷き詰めたヒラミレモンのせいで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thanks to the Hirami lemons tightly spread all over the floor,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王の力が抑えられるのは確認ですわん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we've confirmed that the Demon King's power is being suppressed, wan."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へへっ……つまりこの部屋でなら……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh heh... in other words, here in this room...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どんだけ殴ってこいつが死にかけても、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: no matter how many times we hit this guy and he's about to die,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 絶対に魔王化はしない、っつーことだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he absolutely won't transform into the Demon King."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや！　いや！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No! No!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 来ないで！　来ないでェェ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't come! Don't come!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちっ、絶望してっかと思ったが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tsk, I thought you were in despair,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 案外まだまだ元気じゃねぇか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but you’re surprisingly still full of energy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「てめぇの彼氏だって死んだんだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even your boyfriend died!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前もちったぁ観念したらどうだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why don’t you just give up a little too!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、うそ……そん、な……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "N-No... that can't be..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「健太郎くんが……死んだ……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kentaro-kun... died...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランスくんが……死んだ……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rance-kun... died...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （なーんつって、嘘だがな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Just kidding, that’s a lie.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これで多少生きる気がなくなんなら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If this makes you lose the will to live even a little,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いくらでも嘘を並べてやんぜ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll line up as many lies as I want.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ、もう生きる意味なんざねぇだろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, there's no point in living anymore, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とっとと死ねよ？　ああん？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just hurry up and die, okay? Huh?"
"Ah, uh... ah..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （お、効き目はバッチリだなこりゃ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Oh, it's working perfectly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: へへっ、イジメ甲斐あるじゃねーか）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heh heh, this is worth bullying after all.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「死なねぇってんなら……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you won’t die...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺が殺してやる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then I’ll kill you myself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨大な拳が美樹の体を殴り飛ばす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A huge fist punches Miki's body, sending her flying.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹の軽い体は枯れ葉のように吹き飛び、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki’s light body is blown away like a dead leaf,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大きな音を立てて壁に叩きつけられた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and she crashes into the wall with a loud noise.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、くうっ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, ugh...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 叩きつけられた衝撃で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From the impact of the crash,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹は肺の中の酸素を全て吐き出す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki exhales all the oxygen in her lungs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのままべちゃりと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, with a soft thud,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 力なく床にうずくまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she weakly crouches down on the floor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、うう、痛いよ……痛いよ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "U-uh, it hurts... it hurts...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やだよぇ、やだ、よぉ……ぐすっ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don’t want this, don’t want this... sob..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おいおい、マジかよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, hey, seriously?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さすが魔王ってか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As expected of the Demon King, huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺様のハイパーウルトラパンチで死なねぇ奴、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It’s the first time I’ve seen someone not die from my Hyper Ultra Punch,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 初めて見たぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you know."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、それでも痛ぇと泣くなら構わねぇ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, if you're going to cry because it hurts, that's fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺にだっていつかは殺せるってことだからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That just means I can still kill you someday."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あーうー、でもでもケイブリス様。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, uh, but but, Lord Cavebliss,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今のパンチでもかすり傷しか出来ていないわん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: even with that punch, it only left a scratch, wan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これじゃあ、死ぬまで一年はかかるんじゃ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this rate, it’d take a year to die, wouldn’t it...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一年だぁ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A year, huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へへ、一瞬みてぇなもんじゃねぇか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh heh, that's nothing — like just a moment."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悲願の達成を目前にしたケイブリスは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cavebliss, with the fulfillment of his long-cherished wish right before him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使徒である二人すら初めて見るほど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: distorted his mouth with joy even the two apostles had never seen before.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 嬉しそうに口元を歪めていた。
「まあ、実際はそこまで時間はかからねぇ筈だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, in reality, it shouldn’t take that long.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんたってこれから毎日、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because from now on, every day,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 百発でも千発でも殴り続けるんだからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll keep punching hundreds or even thousands of times."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何日かかろうが絶対に殺してやるぜ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No matter how many days it takes, I will definitely kill you..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王になるのはてめぇじゃねぇ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You’re not the one who’ll become the Demon King!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この俺様だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s me!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

King!"},{"lineNumber":249171,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この俺様だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s me!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これで魔王に覚醒されちゃあ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If the Demon King awakens like this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様の計画は全てパーだぜ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: my entire plan will be ruined, you know!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、大丈夫ですにゃん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, it's alright, nyan."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「床にぎっちり敷き詰めたヒラミレモンのせいで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thanks to the Hirami lemons tightly spread all over the floor,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王の力が抑えられるのは確認ですわん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we've confirmed that the Demon King's power is being suppressed, wan."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へへっ……つまりこの部屋でなら……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh heh... in other words, here in this room...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どんだけ殴ってこいつが死にかけても、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: no matter how many times we hit this guy and he's about to die,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 絶対に魔王化はしない、っつーことだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he absolutely won't transform into the Demon King."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや！　いや！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No! No!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 来ないで！　来ないでェェ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't come! Don't come!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちっ、絶望してっかと思ったが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tsk, I thought you were in despair,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 案外まだまだ元気じゃねぇか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but you’re surprisingly still full of energy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「てめぇの彼氏だって死んだんだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even your boyfriend died!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前もちったぁ観念したらどうだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why don’t you just give up a little too!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、うそ……そん、な……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "N-No... that can't be..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「健太郎くんが……死んだ……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kentaro-kun... died...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランスくんが……死んだ……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rance-kun... died...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （なーんつって、嘘だがな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Just kidding, that’s a lie.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これで多少生きる気がなくなんなら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If this makes you lose the will to live even a little,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いくらでも嘘を並べてやんぜ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll line up as many lies as I want.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ、もう生きる意味なんざねぇだろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, there's no point in living anymore, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とっとと死ねよ？　ああん？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just hurry up and die, okay? Huh?"
"Ah, uh... ah..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （お、効き目はバッチリだなこりゃ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Oh, it's working perfectly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: へへっ、イジメ甲斐あるじゃねーか）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heh heh, this is worth bullying after all.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「死なねぇってんなら……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you won’t die...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺が殺してやる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then I’ll kill you myself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨大な拳が美樹の体を殴り飛ばす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A huge fist punches Miki's body, sending her flying.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹の軽い体は枯れ葉のように吹き飛び、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki’s light body is blown away like a dead leaf,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大きな音を立てて壁に叩きつけられた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and she crashes into the wall with a loud noise.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、くうっ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, ugh...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 叩きつけられた衝撃で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From the impact of the crash,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹は肺の中の酸素を全て吐き出す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki exhales all the oxygen in her lungs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのままべちゃりと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, with a soft thud,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 力なく床にうずくまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she weakly crouches down on the floor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、うう、痛いよ……痛いよ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "U-uh, it hurts... it hurts...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やだよぇ、やだ、よぉ……ぐすっ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don’t want this, don’t want this... sob..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おいおい、マジかよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, hey, seriously?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さすが魔王ってか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As expected of the Demon King, huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺様のハイパーウルトラパンチで死なねぇ奴、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It’s the first time I’ve seen someone not die from my Hyper Ultra Punch,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 初めて見たぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you know."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、それでも痛ぇと泣くなら構わねぇ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, if you're going to cry because it hurts, that's fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺にだっていつかは殺せるってことだからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That just means I can still kill you someday."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あーうー、でもでもケイブリス様。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, uh, but but, Lord Cavebliss,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今のパンチでもかすり傷しか出来ていないわん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: even with that punch, it only left a scratch, wan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これじゃあ、死ぬまで一年はかかるんじゃ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this rate, it’d take a year to die, wouldn’t it...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一年だぁ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A year, huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へへ、一瞬みてぇなもんじゃねぇか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh heh, that's nothing — like just a moment."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悲願の達成を目前にしたケイブリスは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cavebliss, with the fulfillment of his long-cherished wish right before him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使徒である二人すら初めて見るほど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: distorted his mouth with joy even the two apostles had never seen before.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 嬉しそうに口元を歪めていた。
「まあ、実際はそこまで時間はかからねぇ筈だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, in reality, it shouldn’t take that long.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんたってこれから毎日、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because from now on, every day,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 百発でも千発でも殴り続けるんだからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll keep punching hundreds or even thousands of times."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何日かかろうが絶対に殺してやるぜ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No matter how many days it takes, I will definitely kill you..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王になるのはてめぇじゃねぇ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You’re not the one who’ll become the Demon King!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この俺様だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s me!"
